StudyItemDrawer.title: Create Skill
StudyItemDrawer.description: Fill in the details to add a new skill. Add a title, description, and select relevant tags to organize your skills.
StudyItemDrawer.progressDescription: Track the stages and status of your review cycles for effective skill retention.

TagDrawer.title: Create New Tag
TagDrawer.description: Enter a name and description for the new tag to organize your skills.

StudyItemForm.descriptionPlaceholder: For example, 'Formula for finding the hypotenuse'

TagForm.colorPlaceholder: Choose a color for the tag

TagsSelector.tryDifferentSearch: Try a different search or create a new tag.
